import React from 'react' import './header.styles.scss' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import {ReactComponent as Logo} from '../../assets/crown.svg' import {auth} from '../../firebase/firebase.config' import {connect} from 'react-redux' const Header = ({currentUser}) => (
SHOP CONTACT {currentUser?
auth.signOut()}>SIGN OUT
: SIGN IN }
) const mapStateToProps = state => ({ currentUser: state.user.currentUser }) export default connect(mapStateToProps)(Header);
